arrival.translation[0].definitions[0].de: when someone or something arrives somewhere
arrival.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Only the timely arrival of the police prevented the situation from becoming worse.
Traffic problems account for one third of late arrivals.
Shortly after our arrival in London, Lisa was attacked.
A deposit is payable on arrival  (=when you arrive).
arrival.translation[0].definitions[1].de: someone who has just arrived in a place
arrival.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: New arrivals were greeted with suspicion.
Late arrivals will not be admitted to the theatre.
